paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Ala97Ser, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In Taiwan, these patients exhibited male predominance with a mean age at validation of 62.75 years.

functional_data.summary: The Ala97Ser variant is associated with the development of ATTRv amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the high mortality associated with this variant.
key_quotes: The annual prevalence rate of specific mutation (Ala97Ser)-dominant ATTRv amyloidosis with polyneuropathy in Taiwan is comparable to the mid- to high-prevalence country level.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused on the TTR gene variant Ala97Ser, with detailed penetrance information.
